website_summaries.verdict: This lightweight vacuum is perfect for smaller homes and doubles as a handheld vacuum for cleaning up tight spaces or upholstery.
pros: Dirt cup is easy to empty
Light enough to carry up and down stairs
Good suction power on hard floors and low-pile carpets
Easy to maneuver into tight corners
cons: The cord is only 16 feet long, which may be too short for large households

customer_reviews.title: The handheld was useless. Very dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Very weak suction. The handheld was useless. Very dissatisfied. I've bought Bissell for decades. I don't think I will again. If your quality is no quality per price, then I won't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great vac!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one and I chose it over others in the same price range because it had a better motor. My other one (after 7 years) got a bit wonky (and it was pink) and I decided to get a new one. It's great for floors, OK on carpets for quick pick up but not for deep cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: a cromwell

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely useless
customer_reviews.text: This product loses the little bit of suction that it ever had after the first use. It can't even pick up a crumb. Its terrible, save yiyrself the frustration and buy something else. I threw mine in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne S

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Just a handheld vaccum with attachments. Doesn't have great suction power but gets the job done for the most part.
customer_reviews.author: ROBYN HALL

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I just tried this vacuum for the first time this evening, and I was very pleasantly surprised with how well it works! I have a dog that sheds a lot and this picked up the hair and other dirt on our hardwood floors amazingly!!! For the price, you cannot beat it!! I would definitely recommend to anyone with hardwood floors!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Brady

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to clean and use
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to clean and use. Falls a bit short for pet hair, but that's to be expected for something this lightweight and inexpensive. It still picks up quite a bit of hair though, and works for my having just a couple of small area rugs. It also cleans my furniture nicely using the handheld feature.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: ON/OFF SWITCH ALREADY INOPERABLE AFTER LESS THAN ONE MONTH OF USE
customer_reviews.text: very disappointed vacuum was bought for my 80 year old parents who live in a pet free ranch home therefore very limited use.........the vacuum was delivered on May 26th and by June 26th the on/off switch is already inoperable...........vacuum can only be turned on and off by plugging/unplugging. would like to explore options to replace this item
customer_reviews.author: Maryanne MacVicar

customer_reviews.title: Suction is good enough for cleaning of hardwood floors and tile
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight vacume for simple and fast cleaning. Suction is good enough for cleaning of hardwood floors and tile. No brush on bottom of glide so any carpet would be a little more challenging. Only drawback is the electrical cord is quite short which causes a lot of stop and starts. Overall I am pleased with the performance at the cost.
customer_reviews.author: JIM

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our hard floors. The suction is strong. It’s small and lightweight. I love that it is corded because battery powered versions never last long.
customer_reviews.author: Alanna

customer_reviews.title: Great for pet hair
customer_reviews.text: Works great for the RV and dog hair. Suggest buying the extra filters if you have a lot of dust. Filters are washable, but an extra one is handy while the other one dries.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Finkle

customer_reviews.title: Bissell 3in 1 electric broom
customer_reviews.text: My wife love this , it does a good job cleaning the floor and can get into every corner and the beauty is that it can be converted to a hand vacuum
customer_reviews.author: Lennox

customer_reviews.title: You have to try several times to have it suck up a piece of thread or feather on a ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work for carpets at all. You have to try several times to have it suck up a piece of thread or feather on a carpet. Highly disappointed. Wish I could return this. It’s pretty much useless for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rujuta

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: My mom would of like this vacuum if she was alive. She was 93.
customer_reviews.author: Bejamin

customer_reviews.title: Power Stick
customer_reviews.text: It took forever to come but.now I’m hooked. So lightweight but so powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Arthur

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about 2 months and it broke its made of cheap plating
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: This is good for hardwood floors to pickup dust
customer_reviews.text: This is good for hardwood floors to pickup dust, but does not replace a full sized vac at all. If you have carpets, this isn't going to work, even in a small apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Tung

customer_reviews.title: Easy - lightweight cleaning...
customer_reviews.text: From the reviews I read, I was expecting a more "powerful" type of vacuum.It is very lightweight and easy to use but not really that powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi123

customer_reviews.title: This has proven to be a great purchase. I use it in my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This has proven to be a great purchase. I use it in my kitchen, both bathrooms, and on the rug on the patio.
customer_reviews.author: sara e. greene

customer_reviews.title: Great product for small items.
customer_reviews.text: Great suction. Short cord. Unable to suck up anything that’s not tiny. Popcorn for example would not be picked up due to its size. Great for dust and small particles.
customer_reviews.author: Schuyler

customer_reviews.title: Nic4 vaccum
customer_reviews.text: I liked this vacuum so much that I bought another one. Lightweight, good suction and gets into corners.
customer_reviews.author: Bearpaw

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: It's the perfect size & it has so meany options. Fits anywhere
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Vegas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent suction and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This little lightweight floor sweeper/vacuum is great! It is so lightweight and really does a great job picking up animal hair. It makes my job of sweeping the hard floors so much easier. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great mini vac
customer_reviews.text: Great suction, easy to store, easy to break down for all tasks. Good on carpet and hardwood.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Works and has great suction. I wish the cord was a little longer, but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Cleaningoutmyclosets

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size to fit anywhere... just not good for carpets and rugs:(
customer_reviews.author: inga

customer_reviews.title: Pretty loud for a small vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't pick up as well as I thought. Pretty loud for a small vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good suction but would like it to be a bit wider. Very small.
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: No longer works
customer_reviews.text: I thought this vacuum was great when I first bought it, especially for the price. But now only 5 months later it doesn’t work at all anymore.
customer_reviews.author: KTF23_PANJ

customer_reviews.title: Product is great but I over paid big time
customer_reviews.text: was sent from Walmart. Product is great but I over paid big time!!!!
customer_reviews.author: kathyc.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it for bare floor and interim carpet vacuuming jobs.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean with and very light. I am very happy
customer_reviews.author: Nicki Wagner

customer_reviews.title: This is a great replacement for the kitchen broom
customer_reviews.text: This is a great replacement for the kitchen broom. It is light weight and easy to handle. I use it on throw rugs and it works well without sucking them into the head attachment like larger vacuums.
customer_reviews.author: irene denae

customer_reviews.title: Bissell vacuum excellent.
customer_reviews.text: This Bissell has performed excellent. Satisfies the use we lurched this vacuum for perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald W. Mims

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum. Small and compact but powerful enough for every day small cleaning!
customer_reviews.author: Shouser

customer_reviews.title: Better than expectef
customer_reviews.text: Love it just wish handke was a bit longer. Picks up great has much power suction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is soo small is light and perfect, it is very powerful considering its size and ...
customer_reviews.text: I loveeeeeee this little vaccum! It is soo small is light and perfect, it is very powerful considering its size and totally worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Monique da silva

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum works great and it's the perfect size for our small apartment
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum works great and it's the perfect size for our small apartment. I've been using it for our carpet and laminate floors, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: LIFE SAVER! So light, I can practically throw ...
customer_reviews.text: LIFE SAVER! So light, I can practically throw it around the house. I use it as a broom, on all the hard floors before I mop. I use my heavy duty vac for the rugs and carpets. I wish the cord was longer, for sure. That is my only complaint. I have to unplug and plug it into different outlets around the house multiple times to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Hoot

customer_reviews.title: It's cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: It's cheaply made. The foot of it is very small so it doesn't cover a wide space so it takes longer
customer_reviews.author: Doris

customer_reviews.title: but does a terrible job on carpets
customer_reviews.text: Picks up crumbs, lint from hard floor, but does a terrible job on carpets. No good for carpets.
customer_reviews.author: Myron Oakley

customer_reviews.title: It is very light and easy to bust out
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep in my office at work for quick clean-up of dust bunnies. It is very light and easy to bust out, plug in and suck up any unsightly carpet schnipples. The suction is very good too. It fits in tight places and then packs up to be stowed neatly in the corner. Very easy. Good for when you need something simple and effective. Not cumbersome at all.
customer_reviews.author: lovefromthe201

customer_reviews.title: It sucks - but in a good way
customer_reviews.text: I sent this vacuum to my son off in college. He loves it! It obviously isn't as powerful as a full sized vac with a beater bar, but it does a great job for its size. It's small, lightweight, easy to clean, and the price can't be beat. Just right for a quick cleanup. I'm actually considering one for myself to clean the tile in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum sucks, i dont know how it got so many ...
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum sucks, i dont know how it got so many good reviews. The suction on it isnt strong and is cheaply made. Im returning it! Not worth the damn money..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful. We have 2 bedrooms with carpets and had ...
customer_reviews.text: Awful. We have 2 bedrooms with carpets and had to buy an second vacuum because this one wouldn't pick anything up!
customer_reviews.author: Spharo

customer_reviews.title: Not a happy camper.
customer_reviews.text: It was broken when I received it. I had to return it to the store which is what I was trying to avoid by ordering it on-line. Not a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Yes it is everything i expected it to be. It works very well.
customer_reviews.author: ophelia

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent vacuum for small apt. It has enough power to bend small rugs, but it not intended for it for obvious reason: no brush. But if you have laminate or hardwood floor - this is good choice. Also, it not so loud as I expected. Noise level same or even less then roomba robot vacuum. However, filters not easy to clean and looks fragile, so I suggest to buy some. -- Update: there is no filters for this model at Amazon! Just order at Bissell's website - it's even cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for the tile floor in the kitchen. ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the tile floor in the kitchen. It picks up crumbs but won't pick up goldfish crackers or whole pieces of cereal. Will not pick up the cat litter either. The part that comes out to make it a little handheld thing would no longer stay tgether to use in vacuum mode so I have it hot glued together (that broke about 2 months after purchasing). It no longer stands up by itself (that broke not even a month after getting it). I've had it 6 months and I'm not impressed and currently shopping for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Palin

customer_reviews.title: DON'T DO IT
customer_reviews.text: CHEAP. You get what u pay for. I purchased 2. One for B&B and other for me. Ordered new sponge filters and they don't fit properly and the machine won't even fully close. I'm gonna toss mine and get one from B&B and when it starts failing I'll toss it in trash.
customer_reviews.author: Gail S. Kregloe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little broom....
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. A lightweight electric broom to pick up crumbs, hair, and a little dust in between floor cleaning. Clear canister makes it easy to know you need to empty. Small footprint so its easy to store away.
customer_reviews.author: KarenSu

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Little Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I really like my new Bissell lightweight stick vacuum. It is so light but has plenty of suction. It scoops up dog hair, crumbs and other things so well. If you get a call that someone is coming over you can just get it from its hiding place and quickly get everything up without sweating.
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, convenient, effective
customer_reviews.text: I have a small city apartment with a puppy and it works well for that. The head detaches easily for small spaces - though the cord is short that really isn't a problem in my life. It's lightweight and fits in my small storage space. It fits for my life and works well. Hoping it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: kerri

customer_reviews.title: A lifesaver for sucking up dog hair daily.
customer_reviews.text: This has been a life saver for sucking up dog hair daily at our house. It's light so I'm not lugging out a heavy, loud vacuum everyday. We use it on tile, wood laminate, and thin rugs and it works like a charm. I can't say how it would perform on thick carpet but it's perfect for a clean freak like me who's living with her fiancés long hair dog that sheds an insane amount. Many uses and still holding up well. Great for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Great little vacuum. Easy to maneuver. I’m going to order another for upstairs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love this stick vacuum! After researching many other vacuums I decided on this one. I am primarily using it to vacuum kitty litter. The suction is excellent and it can be used on floors as well as low pile rugs. I love the 3 in 1 feature so I can get into corners and small spaces. This is an excellent product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: bella blue

customer_reviews.title: Nice vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Everything about the Bissel is great. Does its job well, no heavy lifting of the vacuum. Emptying the tray with not by hassels
customer_reviews.author: Lois Sahrmann

customer_reviews.title: Great job
customer_reviews.text: Works great, lightweight and easy assembly. Great for steps and furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Bester

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little vacuum. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because is does not quite get ALL the dust off my floor, but still does a good job. Very good product for the price. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: David P

customer_reviews.title: Is very lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Is a gift for me, I use it on tile floor and it works good
customer_reviews.author: edna

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price !
customer_reviews.text: Everything I expected for the price. Doesn't pick up everything but I didn't expect it to knowing I paid less then $40. Super happy with it tho. I have a really big apartment so they is perfect to help so I don't have to sweep as much !
customer_reviews.author: Ashley V.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long.
customer_reviews.text: It is already broken and unusable. All it was ever used for was vacuuming the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: LISA MARIE E JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: does the job pretty much, but I am not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Very loud, does the job pretty much, but I am not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: d dd

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. did not work worth a darn. We sent back and got a refund
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Not bad but doesn't get everything because it has no bristles. Easy to carry around and easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my rug and stairs. My Roomba wouldn't go on my area rug or stay on it if I placed it there. This little vacuum does a good job, is light weight, easy to assemble and fits my needs perfectly. Great for small clean up as well. The cord could be longer, but for the price it's nice!
customer_reviews.author: Tinker

customer_reviews.title: So pleased that I've vacuumed twice this week
customer_reviews.text: We have already recommended this to most of our friends. We live in NYC and wanted a vacuum that wouldn't take up much room. It is a really, really impressive machine for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Hardwood & Rugs
customer_reviews.text: Works great. It's perfect for hardwood and rugs. I love that it's bagless and so light and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: works okay but has a very short cord making difficult to use. Can not recommend
customer_reviews.author: pa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Compact and adaptable. Strong suction for such a little guy, too.
customer_reviews.author: John McGough

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME. picks up so much dust and make my ...
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME. picks up so much dust and make my like a lot easier. It's small and light and works great
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far it wirksd great. Light weight and very quite.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ayala

customer_reviews.title: It sucks
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, easy to clean and has very good suction.
customer_reviews.author: Yu

customer_reviews.title: Its a vacuum
customer_reviews.text: It sucks up cat hair of my rug. Good enough
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: it's a good thing.
customer_reviews.text: I reviewed many others, chose and Mama Likes and when Mama Likes, it's a good thing... A+
customer_reviews.author: Shayne G. Yetter

customer_reviews.title: Quiet
customer_reviews.text: So quiet I was surprised! I use this on my carpet and sometimes I have to go over bigger pieces twice but overall I am happy
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Great versatile vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little vacuum. I have a shark vacuum which is quite heavy for quick little jobs so I purchased this. I have hardwood and ceramic floors and only some are rugs. Really would t have auction to do a good job on rugs but it's perfect for my bare floors and super light. Much better than a swifter with dogs and better than a dust mop to pick up everything. I can buzz this over my floors and it's just right! Works great in my car too!
customer_reviews.author: B. S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: No tools to assemble! Went together in a snap! This vacuum does the job! The price is right!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Metallo

customer_reviews.title: It's all I need right now
customer_reviews.text: I like it! I only wish it covered more surface area in one swoop. It's nice and light, able to carry and use easily with one hand, which means I won't think twice about getting it out to clean something. My apartment is all wood floors with some area rugs and this does well on both surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Powerfull little thing heheh . Dont judge a vacuum by its cover
customer_reviews.author: Lorena

customer_reviews.title: I OWN TWO BISSELL STICK VACUMMS AN I LOVE THEM. THE LAST I HEARD THEY WERE DISCUSING ...
customer_reviews.text: I WANT TO THANK YOU FOR SUCH A FAST DELIVERY, IT WAS A GIFT TO MY BROTHER AND HIS WIFE AND A SURPRISE FOR THEM. I OWN TWO BISSELL STICK VACUMMS AN I LOVE THEM. THE LAST I HEARD THEY WERE DISCUSING WHO WAS GOING TO USE IT FIRST. THANK YOU FOR SUCH A GREAT VACUMM. AND YOUR SERVICE WAS THE BEST.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia A.

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of this vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of this vacuum. My apartment is mostly carpet and it doesn't even have enough suction to get up simple everyday crumbs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. Has virtually no suction at all, and is not worth what I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: NEW Bissell 3 in 1 Lightweight Stick Hand Vacuum Cleaner, Corded - Convertible to Handheld Vac, Grey
product_meta.description: The BISSELL 3-in-1 Stick Vacuum is designed to be your go-to vacuum for cleaning up throughout your home. It easily converts to go anywhere you need it! Use it on carpet, bare floors, stairs and upholstery. The BISSELL 3-in-1 Stick Vacuum provides the versatility of a stick vacuum, hand vacuum and, with the included, a vacuum that easily gets into those hard-to-reach areas.
feature_bullets: Quick release handle, converts to a hand vacuum
For use on carpet, bare floors, stairs and upholstery

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars172 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
specifications.Specific Uses For Product: Carpet, Bare floors, Stairs and Upholstery
